description: Technical Support to the Ministry of Education and Higher Education for the Implementation of the Education Development Plan

subproject.corporate outcome: Access to information policies support accountability and transparency
subproject.description: Provide support to the Ministry of Education and Higher Education through the Education Sector Development Secretariat (ESDS) and to the  Director General through the subsequent phases of preparation, implementation and monitoring of the reform plan and will include a team of technical assistants and technicians mainly in the areas of IT, educational project implementation, public administration and legal expertise.
subproject.title: Support to Ministry of Educ
